meanings.definition: Used as an exclamation to express surprise or emphasis.
meanings.sent2: Well, begorah, I never thought I'd see that!
meanings.sent3: Begorah, the cat just jumped out of the box and scared me!
meanings.sent4: The news hit her like a bolt of lightning, begorah!
meanings.sent5: The fireworks lit up the sky, begorah, dazzling everyone.

meanings.definition: Used as a mild oath or expression of annoyance.
meanings.sent1: Begorah, I can't believe I forgot my keys!
meanings.sent2: Oh begorah, this traffic is driving me crazy!
meanings.sent4: His computer crashed right before the deadline, begorah!
meanings.sent5: The leaky faucet dripped all night, begorah, keeping him awake.
